thread.title: M6: A38(M) closed both ways
thread.title_full: M6: A38(M) closed both ways | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: M6: A38(M) closed both ways
text:
CMPG @CMPG Follow A38(m) closed both ways due to an ongoing Police led incident. Please be patient whilst we deal.
05:09 - 3 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite Drivers are being re-diverted on the Aston Expressway in Birmingham while police deal with an incident on the roads.
The carriageway is closed in both directions, it is unclear how long it will take for the road to be reopened.
Last updated Fri 3 Feb 2017 Travel Birmingham Aston Expressway
